title: Role of APOC3 3238C/G, APOB 12669G/A and SCARB1 1050C/T polymorphisms, their expression in patients of HIV-associated lipodystrophy
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): HariOm Singh, Shyamveer, Chandrashekhar Jori, Supriya D. Mahajan, Ravikumar Aalinkeel, Kathiravan Kaliyappan, Meenakshi Bhattacharya, Mohammad Khalid Parvez, Mohammed S. Al-Dosari
